channel.title: Kicksecure use on MXLinux possible?
channel.description:
Helo,
is Kicksecure compatible with MXLinux (Debian-Antix) too? I tried to install it on the newest MXLinux version but got the following errors:
„plymouth: collision with: console-common but 0.7.91 shall be installed. E: Error: Interrupts by pkgProblemResolver:: Resolve caused; this could causedmby retained packages."
So are they incompatible, though MXLinux is containing Debian? Or is there any solution how to proceed successfully? Thanks for replies and help.

item.title: Kicksecure use on MXLinux possible?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Error: Plymouth conflict in Debian morphing Support
sudo apt install --no-install-recommends kicksecure-xfce-host - Conflict with Plymouth after entering this command when morphing Debian, MX Linux and LMDE. This error was made by me and all my friends. Today, my friend also received it. sudo apt remove plymouth resolves problem. Write about it in morphing instructions so that people know what to do in this situation. It seems that someone has complained about this error on this forum

Read full topic

item.title: Kicksecure use on MXLinux possible?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Created the following wiki page to address this just now:

Kicksecure – 29 Aug 24

Other Operating Systems

How to distribution-morph Other Operating System into Kicksecure?

Read full topic

item.title: Kicksecure use on MXLinux possible?
item.dc:creator: sarrox
item.description:
sam:

But first, wait for developer’s response

Thanks a lot for reply and the hint, sam.
Question to the developer: Can you please add and share your experience concerning MXLinux & Kicksecure?

Read full topic

item.title: Kicksecure use on MXLinux possible?
item.dc:creator: sam
item.description:
Hello. If you can’t install Kicksecure completely, then try installing grub-live from kicksecure github. I was able to do it - MX Linux got live mode.

And you can try uninstalling plymouth (but first, take a snapshot in Timeshift) - I’ve uninstalled it on many linux and after that installing ‘sudo apt install --no-install-recommends kicksecure-xfce-host’ was successful.

But first, wait for developer’s response

Read full topic
